attributes.action: Make corporations and the wealthy pay their fair share of taxes
attributes.background: The Paradise Papers are again highlighting the lengths that corporations and the wealthy will go to to avoid paying their fair share of taxes. The UK government is complicit in allowing this to happen.  The hard working people of the UK end up subsidising

rejection.details:
It’s not clear what the petition is asking the UK Government or Parliament to do.

Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what specific change to tax laws you want the Government and Parliament to make. 

You may also wish to sign this petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/204549
